an10.101:1.1: “Mendicants, when these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.
an10.101:1.3: ‘I have secured freedom from class.’ ‘My livelihood is tied up with others.’ ‘My behavior should be different.’
an10.101:1.4: When these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.
an10.101:2.2: Their deeds and behavior are always consistent with the precepts. They’re content, kind-hearted, and humble. They want to train. They use the necessities of life after reflecting on their purpose. They’re energetic.
an10.101:2.3: When those three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill these seven things.”
